Name: Armourer's Scrap
Description: Improves the quality of an armour

Name: Chaos Orb
Description: Removes a random modifier and augments a rare item with a new random modifier
Note: Right click this item then left click a rare item to applt it.

Name: Divine Orb
Description: Randomizes the numerical values of an item.
Note: Right click this item then left click a item to applt it.

Name: Exalted Orb
Description: Adds 1 random Affix to a Rare item.
Note: Right click this item then left click a rare item to applt it.

Name: Greater Jeweller's Orb
Description: Adds a socket to a skill gem with 4 sockets

Name: Jeweller's Orb
Description: Adds a socket to a skill gem with 3 sockets

Name: Lesser Jeweller's Orb
Description: Adds a socket to a skill gem with 2 sockets

Name: Orb of Alchemy
Description: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item with 4 modifiers
Note: Right click this item then left click a normal item to applt it.

Name: Orb of Annulment
Description: Removes 1 random modifier from a Magic or Rare item.
Note: Right click this item then left click a magic or rare item to applt it.

Name: Orb of Augmentation
Description: Augments a magic item with a new random modifier
Note: Right click this item then left click a magic item to applt it. Magic items can have up to two random modifiers.

Name: Orb of Chance
Description: Randomly transforms a normal item into a Magic, Rare, or Unique item.
Note: Right click this item then left click a normal item to applt it.

Name: Orb of Transmutation
Description: Upgrades a normal item to a magic item with 1 modifier
Note: Right click this item then left click a normal item to applt it.

Name: Regal Orb
Description: Upgrades a magic item to a rare item

Name: Uncut Buff Skill Gem
Description: Creates a Persistent Buff Skill Gem
Note: Uncut Buff Skill Gems must be engraved to become usable.

Name: Uncut Skill Gem
Description: Creates a Skill Gem or Level an existing gem to level 5
Note: Uncut Skill Gems must be engraved to become usable.

Name: Uncut Support Gem
Note: Right Click to create a Support Gem.

Name: Vaal Orb
Description: Unpredictably changes the item and may prevent the item from being crafted further.
Note: Right click this item then left click a rare item to applt it.
